items.title: Stream toggle (Chat)
items.note: New iOS-style switch to choose streaming vs. non-streaming endpoint (/chat/message/stream vs /chat/message). On by default.

items.title: Visual effects toggle (Chat)
items.note: Enable/disable celebratory and mood effects (party/rainbow/matrix). When off, effects won't trigger and any active effects stop immediately.

items.title: MusaiChat: streaming replies + logical/creative POV
items.note: Live token streaming UI. Final JSON parsed to show reasoning toggles.

items.title: MusaiChat + MusaiSearch beta is now working
items.note: Baseline chat and search experiences are live for testers.

items.title: Stability passes on ChatMusai
items.note: Tighten message flow, retries, and partial failover.

items.title: Add LLM chat streaming (cross-provider)
items.note: Support NDJSON/SSE across providers with a shared stream reader.

items.title: Isolate hemispheres (logic/creative)
items.note: Surface bicameral processing distinctly and safely.

items.title: Activity Monitor (Local)
items.note: Prevent runaway parallel tasks and protect system resources.

items.title: Agent Flow Debug Toggle
items.note: Reveal bicamera intermediates during beta only.

items.title: Frontier Support via OpenAI Key
items.note: Let testers attach their own key for larger models.

items.title: Hybrid Mode
items.note: Blend local + remote for cost/perf flexibility (later).

items.title: Top Bar Musai Status Area
items.note: Header, progress, symbol, achievements, and inline quick actions from modules.
